law.catch_line: After consultation with the Commission, the Governor shall appoint a competent, qualified individual...

section.section: After consultation with the Commission, the Governor shall appoint a competent, qualified individual as State Archivist.

The Archivist shall:
be knowledgeable in subjects relevant to archival activities; and
possess experience in archival or related fields.

text.section: The State Archivist is entitled to a salary as provided in the State budget.
